Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions about pricing and implementation

Is there a setup fee or long-term contract?

No setup fees and no long-term contracts. You can cancel anytime with 30 days notice. We include free setup and staff training to get you started quickly.

What happens if my internet goes down?

The customer ordering app works offline, so customers can still view menus and place orders. Orders sync automatically when connection is restored.

Can I integrate with my existing POS system?

SKAN.AL works alongside your current setup. You can export order data to integrate with most POS systems. We're also working on direct integrations for popular systems.

How quickly can we start using the system?

Most restaurants are up and running within 24 hours. We handle the technical setup and provide training for your staff on the same day.

Is support available in Albanian?

Yes! Our support team speaks Albanian and is available 24/7 via phone, email, and chat. We understand Albanian restaurant operations and can help in your preferred language.
